content:
/>
XII.i.3.A.5.c
.
Action to Take if the Additional Dependent Is Not Entitled
Restore or release the full rate payable to entitled persons from the date of reduction or entitlement if it is determined that the additional claimant is not entitled.
title: M21-1, Part XII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section A - Dependency and Indemnity Compensation (DIC) Initial Authorization Issues
citation: Part XII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section A
